newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan's Hub Power gains 4.25 percent.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan's Hub Power gains 4.25 percent.

text.p: Pakistan's Hub Power Co Ltd jumped 1.65 rupees, or 4.25 percent, to 40.45 on Thursday to hit an all-time high on buying sparked by a Supreme Court verdict upholding President Farooq Leghari's decision to dismiss Benazir Bhutto's government, dealers said.
About 700,000 Hub Power shares changed hands in early trade.
"Hub Power is a favourite stock of local and foreign investors because of its guarenteed returns", dealer Shakil Anwar said.

"There is a buying in spree of Hub Power shares on hopes that they will gain in a post-election rally if Nawaz Sharif comes to power". Sharif is considered to be pro-business. -- Karachi newsroom 9221-5685192
